participant_1.background:
My family is so supportive, even though my hobby is a bit unusual.
chocolate is my favorite food.
i like going to rock concerts.
I do not really care about my appearance.
I love celebrating Diwali with my family.

participant_2.background:
I'm going to watch the Nascar race on Sunday and then pretend to be a superhero with my kids.
I love wearing clothes that make me feel like I can take on the world.
I have been eavesdropping on my neighbors for many years, but the weather has never been a factor.
i have won an olympic medal.
i am a civil war reenactment participant.

content.text: I'm good! Just got home from work. What are you up to?
I'm doing well! Getting ready to watch the Nascar race and pretend to be a superhero with my kids.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I'm not much of a sports person, but I love going to rock concerts.
I love rock concerts too! I went to one last week and it was amazing.
It was Green Day! They were so good live.
I love Green Day! I saw them in concert a few years ago and they were amazing.
That's awesome! I'm so glad you like them too.
What's your favorite song by them?
It's hard to choose just one, but I really love "Basket Case" and "When I Come Around."
Those are both great songs! I love "Boulevard of Broken Dreams" too.
That's another great one! I love Green Day's music so much.
Me too! They're one of my favorite bands.
They're one of my favorites too.
Well, I have to go now. It was nice talking to you!
You too! Have a nice night!
